data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy J7 Prime ~ Android 7.0 Nougat
data.actual_result: Attachment still comes around with you after switching channels even though the message(from optional step 4) isn't coming with you
data.expected_result: Attachment disappears and is stuck to the channel you selected the attachment
data.short_description: Attachments stay with you even when switching channels
data.steps_to_repro: - Click the plus icon in the left side of the message box - Add an attachment but do not send - Exit the menu - Write a message (optional) - Switch channels
